alert.note: Alert for Belmont; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Monroe; Muskingum; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 20 at 10:50PM EDT until July 21 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 528 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 3 AM EDT FRIDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL OHIO BELMONT GUERNSEY HARRISON JEFFERSON OH MONROE MUSKINGUM NOBLE IN PENNSYLVANIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST PENNSYLVANIA ALLEGHENY FAYETTE GREENE WASHINGTON WESTMORELAND IN WEST CENTRAL PENNSYLVANIA INDIANA IN WEST VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST WEST VIRGINIA PRESTON IN NORTHERN WEST VIRGINIA MARION MONONGALIA WETZEL IN THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA BROOKE MARSHALL OHIO THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF CADIZ, CALDWELL, CAMBRIDGE, CANONSBURG, CONNELLSVILLE, FAIRMONT, FOLLANSBEE, GREENSBURG, INDIANA, KINGWOOD, LATROBE, MARTINS FERRY, MASONTOWN, MORGANTOWN, MOUNDSVILLE, MURRYSVILLE, NEW KENSINGTON, NEW MARTINSVILLE, PITTSBURGH METRO AREA, ST. CLAIRSVILLE, STEUBENVILLE, TERRA ALTA, UNIONTOWN, WASHINGTON, WAYNESBURG, WELLSBURG, WHEELING, WOODSFIELD, AND ZANESVILLE.

area.areaDesc: Belmont; Guernsey; Harrison; Jefferson; Monroe; Muskingum; Noble
